messages.message: Hey team, seeing some scope selection issues in converse in prod. If I have multiple files in converse, I can't seem to pick a single file that is not the first one in the list of files. Any other single file selection, other than the first one, gets modified to the first file. Is this expected?

cc: @Subash
Can you take a look at this one ? Is this to do with active file selected ?
Yes, this looks like a bug with the new file selection implementation
